name: fright

C1 the feeling of fear, especially if felt suddenly, or an experience of fear that happens suddenly: I lay in bed shaking with fright.give someone a fright You gave her such a fright turning the lights out like that.the fright of someone’s life You gave me the fright of my life (= a very severe fright), jumping out of the shadows like that!
